Package org.ginsim.core.io.parser

Class GINMLWriter<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ginsim.core.io.parser.GINMLWriter<G,​V,​E>
  • Type Parameters:
    G - the graph
    V - the vertex
    E - the edge
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    DynamicGINMLWriter, HierarchicalGINMLWriter, ReducedGINMLWriter, RegulatoryGINMLWriter
    public class GINMLWriter<G extends Graph<V,​E>,​V,​E extends Edge<V>>
extends Object
    Base GINMLWriter class: it provides the common parts of a GINML file and hooks for specialised writers to add their graph-specific data.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi
